Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan® Synergies plus™ Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with tetracycline
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with tetracycline for antimicrobial susceptibility testing.
Indications for Use Summary: Determines quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive enterococci and staphylococci, including tetracycline susceptibility testing for all Staphylococcus and Enterococcus species.
